subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Roscoe Tanner, a top tennis player in the 1970s who has had a long list of legal battles involving financial misconduct, said before an arrest last month that he was trying to turn his life around.
snippet: Roscoe Tanner, a top tennis player in the 1970s who has had a long list of legal battles involving financial misconduct, said before an arrest last month that he was trying to turn his life around.
